data.actual_result: Nothing happens and you have to left click on it for the click to be actually registered
data.expected_result: On releasing the right-click, it should be treated as a second click as it does with the OS and other programs
data.short_description: Holding right click and releasing it does not treat it as a second click [macOS only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click to open the context menu but do not release it - Put your cursor to one of the options available in the context menu - Release the right click button
